channel.title: LatAm Prompt News Feed
channel.description: A daily digest of curated Latin American news.

item.title: LatAm Prompt News Feed - September 11, 2025
item.author: LatAm Prompt News Feed
item.description:
Argentina’s Milei has been getting results — everywhere but the ballot box — The Washington Post

Corruption allegations against the president’s sister cloud his successes.

Inside the CIA’s secret fight against Mexico’s drug cartels — Reuters

Inside the CIA’s secret fight against Mexico’s drug cartels

Rosa Roisinblit, Who Championed the Missing in Argentina, Dies at 106 — The New York Times

She helped create the activist group Grandmothers of Plaza de Mayo, which sought to find relatives who had been killed or “disappeared” by the 1976-83 military dictatorship.

Milei’s ‘Boss’ Becomes Liability After Brutal Loss in Argentina —

Milei’s ‘Boss’ Becomes Liability After Brutal Loss in Argentina
